body: also pls for all indices via the indices fixture, we DO test construction on all indices, so maybe you can just add onto these tests, look in pandas/tests/series/test_constructor.py

Hello @makbigc! Thanks for updating the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/series.py`](https://github.com/makbigc/pandas/blob/fd9c8a6224a7e50ca138f63e30122a0b336b6c88/pandas/core/series.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/series/test_constructors.py`](https://github.com/makbigc/pandas/blob/fd9c8a6224a7e50ca138f63e30122a0b336b6c88/pandas/tests/series/test_constructors.py) !
